name: EtiChopper
description:
EtiChopper

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 31 (Entire Game on One Screen).

Controls
  • W, A, S, D: Move chopper
  • Enter: Open water tank
  • E: Start / Land chopper
Goal

Extinguish all fires. Watch out: The chopper only has a limited amount of fuel. Land on the start building to refuel.

Get water by the lake. You can only drop water if the tank is full.

Remember: The entire game is on one screen, if the chooper flies out of the screen, you have to navigate blind.

Have fun and good luck!
